Method Detail

notifyDataSetChanged

public void notifyDataSetChanged()

updateEnvironments

public void updateEnvironments()
Updates environments such as file time display... For example, this method is useful if you have PreferenceActivity or PreferenceFragment to let the user change preferences. So after the user changed preferences, you just simply call this method and notifyDataSetChanged(), or just call notifyDataSetChanged() (which also calls this method) to update the UI of this adapter.

getCount

public int getCount()

getItem

public IFileDataModel getItem(int position)

getItemId

public long getItemId(int position)

isMultiSelection

public boolean isMultiSelection()

setMultiSelection

public void setMultiSelection(boolean v)
Sets multi-selection mode.
Note:
  • If v = true, this method will also update adapter.
  • If v = false, this method will iterate all items, set their selection to false. So you should consider using a LoadingDialog. This will not update adapter, you must do it yourself.

    • Parameters:
    v - true if multi-selection is enabled

    getSelectedItems

    public ArrayList<IFileDataModel> getSelectedItems()
    Gets selected items.

    Returns:
    list of selected items, can be empty but never be null

    public void add(IFileDataModel item)

    removeAll

    public void removeAll(Collection<IFileDataModel> items)
    Removes all items. Note: this does not notify the adapter that data set has been changed.

    Parameters:
    items - the items you want to remove.
